Salah Taher (1911–2007) bụ onye Ijipt na-ese ihe.
Ọ Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ruo oge ụfọdụ dịka onye nkuzi eserese na nka na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Al-Abaseyya dị na Alexandria
Ọ gara n'ihu bụrụ onye ama ama na 1960 ka a họpụtara ya onye isi nke Museum of Modern Arts
Na 1962, a họpụtara ya onyeisi nke Opera
Ọ na-ese ihe karịrị 35 eserese, maka Al-Ahram na mma mgbidi nke ụlọ ya
N'ozuzu, ọ na-ese ihe osise 15000 ma mee ihe ngosi nka ihe karịrị 80 maka ọrụ ya na Egypt, Venice, New York City, San Francisco, Geneva, Beirut, Kuwait na Jeddah
O sonyekwara na ihe ngosi 67 mkpokọta na Egypt
Ọrụ ya bụkwa akụkụ nke mkpokọta White House ma na-atụgharị ma na-egosipụtakarị na White House
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi mgbe ụfọdụ na mmekorita ya na ụlọ ọrụ dị ka Institut des cultures arabes et méditerranéennes na Geneva.2017.
E nyere ya onyinye kachasị elu na Egypt na mba ụwa, n'etiti ha na 1961 bụ Guggenheim Award
N'afọ 2001, a kwanyeere ya ùgwù n'akụkụ onye nrite Nobel Naguib Mahfouz na mmeghe dị nro nke Bibliotheca Alexandrina, nke akpọrọ "The brush and the pen," site na ibipụta akwụkwọ banyere ọrụ ya.
Ọ nọgidere n'ọkwa nke onye ndụmọdụ nka maka Al-Ahram ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
Ọ nwụrụ, mgbe ọ dị afọ 95, na Febụwarị 6, 2007 n'ihi ọrịa kansa akpịrị
O nwere nwa nwoke, Ayman, onye bụkwa onye na-ese ihe, na ụmụ ụmụ abụọ.
Ọrụ ya nke Mathaf chịkọtara: Arab Museum of Modern Art na Doha, ma tinye ya na ihe ngosi ya na-adịgide adịgide
N'afọ 2018, Barjeel Art Foundation nwetara ọrụ ya akpọrọ 'Metaphysic' na Sharjah ma bụrụzi akụkụ nke ihe ngosi ogologo oge na Sharjah Art Museum.
